name: Cog
tagline: cog is a cognitive psychology evaluator developed for use in the labs @ Oklahoma University.
body:
The main goal of cog is to provide a way to administer studies that is accessible, configurable and scalable. 

### Programs
cog is designed to run off of programs. A program is a collection of question block/mode pairs. 
Programs can be setup by the administrator to change the content of a study at any time.
```
day1:
[
   {
      mode:  modes.study,
      block: 2
   },
   {
      mode:  modes.test,
      block: 2
   }
]
```

### Local deployment
cog is designed to be deployed locally with no communication to a server. This is ideal when dealing with the constraints of a scientific study. It is 100% self sufficient and interfaces with a local proxy that can easily be swapped out with server proxy if desired.

### Questions? Want to contribute?
Contact the manager of the project on github (see below).

### Authors and Contributors
[ginman86](https://github.com/ginman86)
[Z3roCool](https://github.com/Z3roCool)
